ModMetaData.name: Close Quarters Combat Brutality
ModMetaData.author: SinaKpaa
ModMetaData.description:
New melee attacks
Pawns will now perform other melee attacks besides punching with their fists. This includes:
-Striking with their palm heel (hand).
-Pushing people to stun them (arms).
-Scratching with their nails (fingers).
-Biting people (increased chance of happening).
-Bashing somebody with their own head (-||-).
-Hitting with their elbow (arm) or a knee (leg).
-Kicking
All vanilla prosthetics, that should have a melee attack now have one, including the peg leg and the denture.
Combat Extended is incompatible with CQC Brutality, use CQC Brutality -patch instead.
